entry.title: Web-based server administration made easy
entry.summary: I've tried a wide variety of different web interfaces for server adminstration. Some were extremely powerful and extensible, but were an absolute pain to deal with on a regular basis. After a good deal of searching for the perfect software, Ajenti seemed to check each and every box I…
entry.content:
I've tried a wide variety of different web interfaces for server adminstration. Some were extremely powerful and extensible, but were an absolute pain to deal with on a regular basis. After a good deal of searching for the perfect software, Ajenti seemed to check each and every box I was looking for.

http://ajenti.org
